items.title: Revival Rate Constraint
items.content:
1091: :label: rem-observation-revival-rate-constraint
1092: 
1093: In the two-state model, KL-non-expansiveness requires $\lambda_{\text{revive}} \le 1$.
1094: 
1095: **Physical interpretation**: Revival rate must not exceed the death rate (on average) for stability.
items.raw_directive:
1088: **Conclusion**: If $\lambda \le 1$, contraction holds. If $\lambda > 1$, expansion!
